Name: usecatupd
Description: user can update system catalogs. (even a superuser cannot do this unless this column is true.)

Name: userepl
Description: user can initiate streaming replication and put the system in and out of backup mode.

Name: passwd
Description: password (possibly encrypted); null if none. see pg_authid for details of how encrypted passwords are stored.

Name: valuntil
Description: password expiry time (only used for password authentication)

Name: useconfig
Description: session defaults for run-time configuration variables
